name: Aggressive
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage output by 2.
traitDescription: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

name: Ambusher
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective attack bonus by 1.
traitDescription: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

name: Amorphous
traitDescription: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

name: Amphibious
traitDescription: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

name: Angelic Weapons
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by the amount noted in the trait.
traitDescription: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage.

name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traitDescription: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

name: Avoidance
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 1.
traitDescription: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Blind Senses
traitDescription: The grimlock can't use its blindsight while deafened and unable to smell.

name: Blood Frenzy
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective attack bonus by 4.
traitDescription: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attacks against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

name: Breath Weapon
crEffect: For the purpose of determining effective damage output, assume the breath weapon hits two targets, and that each target fails its saving throw.
traitDescription: (Recharge 5-6). The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Brute
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by the amount noted in the trait.

name: Charge
crEffect: Increase the monster's damage on one attack by the amount noted in the trait.

name: Constrict
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 1.

name: Damage Transfer
crEffect: Double the monster's effective hit points. Add one-third of the monster's hit points to its per-round damage.

name: Death Burst
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective damage output for 1 round by the amount noted in the trait, and assume it affects two creatures.

name: Dive
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective damage on one attack by the amount noted in the trait.

name: Elemental Body
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by the amount noted in the trait.

name: Enlarge
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by the amount noted in the trait.

name: Fiendish Blessing
crEffect: Apply the monster's Charisma modifier to its actual AC.

name: Frightful Presence
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective hit points by 25% if the monster is meant to face characters of 10th level or lower. Almost identical to Horrifying Visage. (range 120ft instead of 60ft)

name: Horrifying Visage
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective hit points by 25% if the monster is meant to face characters of 10th level or lower. Almost identical to Frightful Presence. (range 60ft instead of 120ft)

name: Innate Spellcasting
crEffect: See step 13 under "Creating a Monster Stat Block."

name: Legendary Resistance
crEffect: Each per-day use of this trait increases the monster's effective hit points based on the expected challenge rating: 1-4, 10 hp; 5-10, 20 hp; 11 or higher, 30 hp.

name: Magic Resistance
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 2.

name: Martial Advantage
crEffect: Increase the effective damage of one attack per round by the amount gained from this trait.

name: Nimble Escape
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC and effective attack bonus by 4 (assuming the monster hides every round)

name: Pack Tactics
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective attack bonus by 1.

name: Parry
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 1.

name: Possession
crEffect: Double the monster's effective hit points.

name: Pounce
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective damage for 1 round by the amount it deals with the bonus action gained from this trait.

name: Psychic Defense
crEffect: Apply the monster's Wisdom modifier to its actual AC if the monster isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield.

name: Rampage
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by 2.
